lead_paragraph: Egypt, the defending champion, and Cameroon advanced Thursday to the final of the African Cup of Nations in Ghana. Amr Zaki scored two second-half goals as Egypt defeated Ivory Coast, 4-1. Earlier in the day, Cameroon beat host Ghana, 1-0, on a 71st-minute goal by Alain Nkong. The final will be Sunday in Accra.
